statements.select:
Select SerialNum ,AllergyHistory ,DiseaseHistory ,Disability ,GeneticHistory ,Eating ,Dressing ,Defecation , Walk ,Bath ,Cognitive ,Emotional ,EyeInfo ,Hearing,CreateUser,CreateDate,UpdateUser,UpdateDate From PatiBasicHealthy
SerialNum=#SerialNum#
statements.insert: INSERT INTO PatiBasicHealthy(SerialNum ,AllergyHistory , DiseaseHistory ,Disability ,GeneticHistory ,Eating ,Dressing , Defecation ,Walk ,Bath ,Cognitive ,Emotional ,EyeInfo ,Hearing, CreateUser,CreateDate,UpdateUser,UpdateDate) VALUES (#SerialNum# ,#AllergyHistory# ,#DiseaseHistory# ,#Disability# ,#GeneticHistory# ,#Eating# ,#Dressing# ,#Defecation# ,#Walk# , #Bath# ,#Cognitive# ,#Emotional# ,#EyeInfo# ,#Hearing#,#CreateUser#,#CreateDate#,#UpdateUser#,#UpdateDate#)
statements.update:
UPDATE PatiBasicHealthy SET AllergyHistory = #AllergyHistory# , DiseaseHistory = #DiseaseHistory# , Disability = #Disability# , GeneticHistory = #GeneticHistory# , Eating = #Eating# , Dressing = #Dressing# , Defecation = #Defecation# , Walk = #Walk# , Bath = #Bath# , Cognitive = #Cognitive# , Emotional = #Emotional# , EyeInfo = #EyeInfo# , Hearing = #Hearing#, UpdateUser = #UpdateUser#, UpdateDate = #UpdateDate#
SerialNum=#SerialNum#
